text: Talgach (Bengali: তালগাছ) is a famous Bengali poem written by Rabindranath Tagore. It is included in the poetry book Sishu Bholanath. Tagore wrote it especially for the children. It has 24 rhythmic lines. The poem is about the palm tree. == References == Category:Poems by Rabindranath Tagore Category:Bengali-language poems == External Links == * rabindra- rachanabali.nltr.org *www.bangla-kobita.com Category:Poems Category:Rabindranath_Tagore Category:Works_by_Rabindranath_Tagore
title: Talgach (poem)
